name: Slow Cooker Chicken Souvlaki
description: Whether it’s a fun-filled weekend or a busy weekday, dinner can just magically appear while you tackle your to-do list—enter, your slow cooker! This'll bring you a hassle-free it dinner that’s bursting with Mediterranean flavours. Prep things in the morning, then set it and forget it.

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breasts, pork, or lamb, cut into strips

preparation: In a small bowl combine oil, lemon juice, and Souvlaki Seasoning. Season with Salt and Pepper, if desired.
Toss chicken, peppers, and oil mixture together in a slow cooker and spread out evenly.
Close lid and cook 3 hours on high, or 6 hours on low, or until chicken is cooked and the peppers are soft.
Serve with warm pitas and your favorite fixings.
tips: 1 recipe, 2 ways:  Make it fast in your microwave: Easy Souvlaki  Make a big batch on a sheet pan: Sheet Pan Chicken Souvlaki
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup baby spinach or seasonal, mixed veggies, 2 tbsp prepared Dillicious Tzatziki, 1 serving prepared Classic Greek Salad.
